sense.def: Pathological Condition of those cases of jiao qi 脚氣 , leg qi, where the legs are desiccated and emaciated, painful, and not swollen. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 45: 治乾脚氣，風毒搏於脚膝， 皮內乾枯，脚脛漸細，骨中疼痛 , “To cure dry leg qi . Wind poison has struck at the legs and knees. The interior of the skin has dried up. Gradually the legs and shins shrink. Inside the bones one feels pain”.
